item.title: Image links
item.description: This is some text before the first heading of this post. Unclickable image (works!) # org-mode-unicorn-logo.png # Org source #+name: fig__unclickable_image #+caption: Don't click this image -- It's not a hyperlink [[/static/images/org-mode-unicorn-logo.png]] Figure 1: Don’t click this image – It’s not a hyperlink To be fixed (Now fixed): The sub-headings in a post get exported as Heading 1 instead of Heading 2. For example, this sub-section’s heading is exported as:
